Home.title: Law office
Home.law_office_description: Experience the future of legal practice at our modern law office, where tradition and technology unite to serve your best interests.
Home.lawyerMoto: Our expertise, your security in business!

Services.servicesDescription: From securing your property transactions and protecting your digital privacy to navigating the complexities of digital assets, IT law, obligations, and commercial ventures, our expertise ensures your business and personal affairs are safeguarded with precision and confidence.
Services.commercialLawShortText: Empowering your business with comprehensive legal solutions.
Services.obligationLawShortText: We protect your rights and provide support in contractual relations.
Services.itLawShortText: We ensure your technological ventures succeed within a solid legal framework.
Services.lawDigitalAssetsShortText: Protect and manage your digital assets with our legal support.
Services.personalDataProtectionShortText: Protecting your privacy in the digital age in compliance with GDPR.
Services.realEstateShortText: Legal services related to real estate transactions and ownership.
Services.inheritanceLawShortText: Reliable support in inheritance processes and asset distribution.
Services.familyLawShortText: Expert support in family matters, protection, and representation of your rights.
Services.laborLawShortText: Professional support for employers and employees in all aspects of labor relations.
Services.digital_assets_guide: Digital Assets in Practice: A Guide for Legal Entities and Individuals
Services.virtual_currency_integration: Integration of Virtual Currencies into Everyday Business
Services.crypto_market_regulation: How Legally (Un)regulated is the Cryptocurrency Market in BiH?
Services.law_faculty: Faculty of Law, University of Banja Luka

Partners.about0: Drobnjak Legal & Partners, our partner in Serbia, covers all areas of law and provides comprehensive legal services throughout Serbia. Thanks to this partnership, we can ensure expert support and legal representation for clients in Serbia at the highest level.
Partners.about1: Drobnjak Legal & Partners, founded by attorney Bojana Drobnjak in 2012, is a reliable partner in your business, whose growth is based on trust, good results, and continuous improvement.
Partners.about2: With a long tradition of advising clients in all areas of corporate law, they excel in quality, flexibility, innovation, and practical solutions to complex business challenges. Their clients are reputable companies in the pharmaceutical, banking, construction, real estate development, hospitality, factoring, and transportation industries.

paragraphs.p1: Nataša Tica is the founder of the Law Office Nataša Tica and has significant experience in commercial and property law in the Republic of Srpska and Bosnia and Herzegovina. With extensive experience in notary offices and international companies, as well as as an independent entrepreneur and legal advisor for startups, IT law, and digital assets, she brings advanced legal strategies and solutions. As a lecturer and panelist, she has participated in numerous conferences and workshops, including those at the Chamber of Commerce of the Republic of Srpska and the Faculty of Law, University of Banja Luka. Her experience and passion for the legal profession enable her to provide high-quality legal services and advice on complex legal issues.
paragraphs.p3: Faculty of Law, University of Banja Luka
paragraphs.p4: Certified Data Protection Officer (CDPO) - a professional qualification that confirms expertise in personal data protection, particularly in accordance with the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation). The CDPO certification is increasingly important in the business world, as data protection regulations become stricter, and companies are required to ensure compliance.
paragraphs.r1: Associate at the Agency for Economic Development of the City of Prijedor “PREDA-PD”
paragraphs.r3: Compliance Officer at Obsidian Media LLC
paragraphs.r4: Legal Consultant at Molson Coors BH
paragraphs.r5: Professional Associate in a notary office
paragraphs.r6: Independent Legal Advisor for startups, IT law, and digital assets
paragraphs.p5: Lecturer and panelist at several conferences and professional workshops, such as:
paragraphs.pr1: “Digital Assets in Practice: A Guide for Legal Entities and Individuals” at the Chamber of Commerce of the Republic of Srpska
paragraphs.pr2: “Integration of Virtual Currencies into Everyday Business” in Jahorina
paragraphs.pr3: “Local Government in RS” at the Faculty of Law, University of Banja Luka.
paragraphs.p6: Co-author of the Handbook on Implementing Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorism Financing Measures via Virtual Currencies.
paragraphs.c1: Bar Association of the Republic of Srpska
